page.title: 04The Village Shop
page.content: I am thankful to be able to say that the village shop is still alive and kicking and still has a useful part to play in the local community. We are grateful for regular local support and hope to provide goods and services in the future. Village stores in general have seen many changes during the past 20_30 yrs and sadly many have not survived. One reason is the simple fact that they cannot compete in price with super_ markets. However, we are able to stock a range of goods suitable to the local community. We can still supply Mr L's favourite tobacco and still slice a single rasher to a certain thickness! We maintain a delivery service to the elderly, etc., and have an agency for Dry Cleaning, Laundry and Shoe Repairs.
